en_text: Wh-What do you mean?
jp_text: ど どいうことですか？

en_text: Only one of you
jp_text: お前ら２人のうち➡

en_text: They're always so beautiful to behold!
jp_text: 何度 見ても…美しい！

en_text: Why did they pair Kenji and me?!
jp_text: 《何で俺とケンジなんだ！》

en_text: It isn't just you. the same rule applies to the other ants.
jp_text: 他のチームの｢アンツ｣も同じだ｡
google_translated: The other team's "ant abs" is the same.

en_text: They don't need to bother comparing us.
jp_text: 《比べるまでもなく➡

en_text: Standing around is pointless.
jp_text: とにかく作業を続けよう｡

en_text: Welcome back, Mutta! I've been waiting for you!
jp_text: お帰り！ムッタ 待ってたよ～｡
google_translated: welcome home!I was waiting for Mutta.

en_text: They dance with such grace!
jp_text: あの美しく優雅な舞い…｡

en_text: Oh, really? That's too bad.
jp_text: あ～そうかぁ～残念｡

en_text: No, I didn't see them. Were they nearby?
jp_text: いや 見なかったよ いたの？

en_text: Oh, that's too bad!
jp_text: そうかぁ～残念だぁ～｡➡

en_text: Next time, I'll use the mic to notify you guys.
jp_text: マイクでちゃんと知らせるよ｡
google_translated: I will show you properly with the microphone.

en_text: But even knowing that,
jp_text: でも まあ そうと分かってても➡
google_translated: But even if I understand that

en_text: I have a task I need to complete...
jp_text: 《俺には やることがあるんだ！》

en_text: Sharon!
jp_text: ⦅シャロン！⦆

en_text: But I plan to be the first one chosen to go to the moon and build your telescope.
jp_text: ⦅俺が誰より先に選ばれて➡

en_text: What good would telling him about Sharon do?
jp_text: 伝えてどうすんだ！》

en_text: We've always been united!
jp_text: すべて肯定し合ってた｡➡

en_text: Because they can save lives.
jp_text: 人命に関わるものだからね｡
google_translated: Because it is related to human life.

en_text: I don't think the lunar telescope will be necessary this time.
jp_text: 今回は なくていいと思う｡
google_translated: I think I do not have this time.

en_text: Hey, hey! Look at this! what do you think, mutta?
jp_text: お前の意見は？ムッタ｡

en_text: If we aren't adding the high-capacity antenna,
jp_text: 作らない以上は➡

en_text: That makes sense.
jp_text: 確かに…｡

en_text: If that's what Kenji thinks,
jp_text: ケンジがそう言うなら➡

en_text: I guess I can give up the telescope...
jp_text: 諦めるしか…ないかな｡

en_text: In that case, the additional facilities will be mega solar panels, a secondary debris barrier,
jp_text: じゃあ 基地に追加する設備は➡
google_translated: Then the facilities to add to the base are ➡

en_text: they've barely spoken.
jp_text: 急に会話が少なくなったよ｡

en_text: Load as much on the cart as you can.
jp_text: カートに積めるだけ積んどけ｡

en_text: Hey, Andy...
jp_text: なあ アンディ…｡

en_text: Does it mean that the other can't ever go?
jp_text: この先ずっとの話なの？
google_translated: Is this a talking about this?

en_text: I had to wait a long time.
jp_text: ずいぶん待たされた｡➡

en_text: What do I have to fix?
jp_text: ｢何を直せばいい｣➡

en_text: Back then, when I dropped a pen,
jp_text: ペンを落としただけでも➡

en_text: I stopped thinking about it.
jp_text: 考えるのをやめたさ｡

en_text: I work much harder, Mutta.
jp_text: ムッタよ｡

en_text: Right.
jp_text: はい｡

en_text: He stopped thinking about it...
jp_text: 《｢考えるのをやめた｣か…》

en_text: I just received a transmission from the support divers.
jp_text: 支援ダイバーから連絡があった｡

en_text: There's a battery of barracudas heading toward your staging area.
jp_text: 今 そちらの資材置き場の方に➡
google_translated: Now that there is a resource storage area

en_text: There shouldn't be a problem, but try not to scare them.
jp_text: 問題ないと思うけど➡
google_translated: I think there is no problem but

en_text: Sounds like they're coming toward you, Mutta.
jp_text: ムッタの方に向かってるぞ｡

en_text: Y-Yeah, I'm fine...
jp_text: えっ ああ…何ともない｡

en_text: That's how it felt...
jp_text: そんな出来事だった…》

en_text: Guys, I'd like to retract
jp_text: みんな 今朝の俺の発言｡➡

en_text: Scientists, doctors, astronomers...
jp_text: 科学とか 医学とか天文学とか➡
google_translated: Science or medicine, astronomy or something

en_text: My family gives me strength!
jp_text: 家族の思いの分 僕は強い＞
google_translated: Minutes of my family I am strong>
